de.wwu.muggl.vm.impl.logic
Class LogicVirtualMachine

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      de.wwu.muggl.vm.VirtualMachine
          de.wwu.muggl.vm.impl.symbolic.SymbolicVirtualMachine
              de.wwu.muggl.vm.impl.logic.LogicVirtualMachine
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class LogicVirtualMachine
extends SymbolicVirtualMachine

This concrete class represents a virtual machine for the logic execution of java bytecode. It inherits functionality from the symbolic virtual machine but overrides some of it in order to prevent undesired effects such as the generation of test cases.

Version:
1.0.0, 2010-07-15
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

Constructor Detail

LogicVirtualMachine

public LogicVirtualMachine(Application application,
                           MugglClassLoader classLoader,
                           ClassFile classFile,
                           Method initialMethod)
                    throws InitializationException
Basic constructor, which initializes the additional fields.

Parameters:
application - The application this virtual machine is used by.
classLoader - The main ClassLoader to use.
classFile - The classFile to start execution with.
initialMethod - The Method to start execution with. This Method has to be a method of the supplied classFile.
Throws:
InitializationException - If initialization of auxiliary classes fails.
Method Detail

createFrame

protected Frame createFrame(Frame invokedBy,
                            Method method,
                            java.lang.Object[] arguments)
                     throws ExecutionException
Create a new frame and check whether its local variables should be initialized to logic variables.

Overrides:
createFrame in class SymbolicVirtualMachine
Parameters:
invokedBy - The frame this frame is invoked by. Might by null.
method - The Method that this frame holds.
arguments - The arguments that will be stored in the local variables prior to execution.
Returns:
The new frame.
Throws:
ExecutionException - On any fatal error that happens during execution and is not coped by one of the other Exceptions.

getAnObjectref

public Objectref getAnObjectref(ClassFile classFile)
Generate an instance of Objectref for the specified ClassFile and check whether its fields should be initialized to logic variables.

Overrides:
getAnObjectref in class VirtualMachine
Parameters:
classFile - The class file to get an object reference for.
Returns:
A new instance of objectref for this ClassFile.
Throws:
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError - If class initialization fails.
